Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: haydenc
Reviews.Content: Great fast service! Would highly suggest buying a phone from them! The phone was in excellenty condition also! It also came with contact information if dissatisfied

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: crw856
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a standard SAMSUNG phone with no keypad. Because I do a lot of texting, the keyboard was a must for me. However, this phone lasted me 2 months at the most before it went haywire on me. It started by turning on and off on its own. I called LG about the issue, and they had me send the phone back. I was without my Verizon service for at least a week and got the phone back. Looking at what they did, the sheet said they replaced the chipset in the phone. After starting to use the phone again, it started its shutdown and startup process again automatically. I called LG AGAIN and they wanted me to send it back AGAIN! What a joke! If they can't fix it the first time around, I'm certainly not sending it back for the second time to be without service for another week (or more).I DO NOT recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Overall, great!
Reviews.Author: KJ "KJ"
Reviews.Content: The only thing I am finding has to do with the buttons on the 'keyboard'--they are slick--hard to keep my fingers on.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Read For Life "Kim"
Reviews.Content: I'm visiually impaired and this phone is awesome 4 me.  I esp like it bc it has alot of settings u can change.  SOME r: font size, font style, clock format, brightness and theme, and backlight time (to name a few).  It is compact and I love the keyboard--for texting.  Plus, they sell many covers (for protection) for it on Amazon for $2 to $5 (very reasonable).  I hope they make a newer model 4 this phone in a year or so bc I will certainly buy it.  This is the LG Cosmo II VN250 for Verizon wireless pre-paid.

Reviews.Title: Careful with cell phones
Reviews.Author: Addie
Reviews.Content: I am a novice about phones, I guess. I was trying to replace a smart phone bill $45 A MONTH with Verizon with a regular phone $9.99 to avoid the $300 penalty for early cancellation.  This phone was not acceptable for Verizon and I still had to purchase a phone at full price from Verizon, anyway. I feel I was snookered by Verizon, not the Amazon vendor.  Now, I am deeper into this expensive money saving scheme.My service wth Amazon was wonderful, everything was fine with the vendor.  I am rating them high because it was not their fault that I am so ignorant.

Reviews.Title: Wireless LG Cosmos Prepaid
Reviews.Author: Meriread Bookmad
Reviews.Content: I am still learning about it, but it does well what I wanted it for.  Cost is cheaper than what I expected, so overall I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Prepaid phone quality and service.
Reviews.Author: sharon w simmons
Reviews.Content: The phone is great. It's better than the contract phone. The plan it's on is much cheaper. Also the customer service reps were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Clearance WOW
Reviews.Author: Walenda
Reviews.Content: Clearance  tag was on the package from Target WOW at least take the tag off lol.  The tag was 10.00  less then i payed for it.

Reviews.Title: It was a nice phone to bad it was stolen!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eliina
Reviews.Content: I was super excited when i got my new phone since my last one fell out of my pocket when my car died and i had to push it up the street. While trying to activate this phone the lady kept asking me for the code to activate it. we tried 4 time to make sure she had the right number and every single time it came up lost/stolen. since it was new and in original packaging, me and the sales rep came to the conclution it was 100% STOLEN.  DO NOT BUY PHONE FROM THIS SELLER!!!! this was a huge pain in my butt having to return it back to amazon seller and find a store to buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: Patti Hale
Reviews.Content: When I got the phone went to set it up and the battery would not hold a charge, froze up when trying to get ring tones that where pre program in the phone, and this was a new phone in new packageing. Sorry to say but I was realy looking forward to getting the phone sent it back This could have been one of those times whem I got a lemon

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: bgs890
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with the product I received- the phone was completely new and everything was intact. I would recommend buying from this supplier. Job well done.

Reviews.Title: LG
Reviews.Author: Belinda Conaway
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A WONDERFUL GIFT i gave my son for his 16th  birtday he was so very happy. I hope to make more purchases in the near future. I am planning on doing more sopping for cristmas

ProductInfo.Features:
Bluetooth compatibility
Built-in 1.3MP digital camera
Internet access and browsing
Operates on CDMA 1x 800/1900MHz networks
Color display
